name: iOS 16.6.1 and iPadOS 16.6.1
available: iPhone 8 and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 3rd generation and later, iPad 5th generation and later, and iPad mini 5th generation and later

advisories.available: iPhone 8 and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 3rd generation and later, iPad 5th generation and later, and iPad mini 5th generation and later
advisories.impact: Processing a maliciously crafted image may lead to arbitrary code execution. Apple is aware of a report that this issue may have been actively exploited.
advisories.description: A buffer overflow issue was addressed with improved memory handling.

cves.credit: The Citizen Lab at The University of Torontoʼs Munk School

advisories.available: iPhone 8 and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 3rd generation and later, iPad 5th generation and later, and iPad mini 5th generation and later
advisories.impact: A maliciously crafted attachment may result in arbitrary code execution. Apple is aware of a report that this issue may have been actively exploited.
advisories.description: A validation issue was addressed with improved logic.
